mapper.sql: PK_ASSET_PROBLEM, PROV_CODE, PK_ASSET, PROP_CODE, CURRENT_VERSION, PREVIOUS_VERSION, BASELINE_VERSION, FOUND_TIME, PROBLEM_TYPE, PROBLEM_CONTENT, PROBLEM_STATE, PROBLEM_DESC, PROBLEM_SRC
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from adc_asset_problem
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into adc_asset_problem (PK_ASSET_PROBLEM, PROV_CODE, PK_ASSET, PROP_CODE, CURRENT_VERSION, PREVIOUS_VERSION, BASELINE_VERSION, FOUND_TIME, PROBLEM_TYPE, PROBLEM_CONTENT, PROBLEM_STATE, PROBLEM_DESC, PROBLEM_SRC) values (#{pkAssetProblem,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pkAsset,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{propCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{previousVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baselineVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{problemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{problemContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{problemState,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{problemDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{problemSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update adc_asset_problem
